name: Alec Bradley - Maxx Connecticut - The Fix
additionalNotes: The Alec Bradley Maxx Connecticut is wrapped in a beautiful Connecticut shade leaf, with Costa Rican binder and fillers from Colombia, Nicaragua, Mexico and Honduras. This line of all large ring gauge cigars ranging from 54 to 60 ring was an expansion of the Habano wrapped Maxx cigars, as a result of popular demand. This is a silky smooth, creamy smoke.
